participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and passionate about his interests, Jake is someone who enjoys the thrill of racing and the intensity of UFC. He has a strong work ethic and values his leisure time.
participant_1.background: i am a construction worker. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite food is mexican food. i've been working since i was sixteen years old.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and dedicated, Emily strives for excellence in her studies and has a clear vision for her future. She is friendly and supportive, always encouraging others to reach their goals.
participant_2.background: when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. my current goal is to run a k. i'm currently in high school. i make straight as in school.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
